channel.title: Drop Rates.. Please HELP! :(
channel.description:
Hello everyone.. I just wanted a little help in my server, i am new to coding so i hope you would help me.. It's about Drop Rates. I do not know how to change the rates i tried everything but won't work.. This is the code: [code]#corp beast 526:1 995:50000000 13734:99 15001:1 13746:1 11335:1 13748:1 13750:1 13752:1 13752:1 13752:1 13752:1 13754:1 13754:1 13754:1[/code] So i want that the Elysian Sigil (13750) will drop 100% but i never get it.. So please HELP!
Edit: Please HELP! i can't do anything if i dont do this.
